high_descs: Turn left, hang a right at the wall and walk to the white toilet.
Pick up the green candle in the middle from the toilet tank.
Turn around and walk to the middle of the vanity in between the sinks.
Place the green candle in between the sinks on the vanity counter.
anns.task_desc: Place a green candle on a counter.

high_descs: Make a right around the corner to reach the toilet.
Pick up the candle from the back of the toilet.
Turn right to walk back to the sinks.
Set the candle down in between the two sinks.
anns.task_desc: Move a candle from the toilet tank lid to the sink countertop.

high_descs: Move to the left and face the toilet.
Pick the candle up from the back of the table.
Go to the right and cross the room to face the counter between the sinks.
Put the candle down on the counter between the sinks.
anns.task_desc: Put a candle on a counter.
